gameplay

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the bulk of the actions available in the game. It sets up the game, and provides a layer of access to the game components for the controller.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team 10 - SOEN6441
